page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: We were interested in why people chose to live in the area.Very few of those we talked to were actually born here and they had varied reasons for coming.{Sir George Young,}Under Seceratary of State for the Environment lives here because his ancestors came to the village two hundred years ago attracted by the river and the easy access to {London. Wendy Craig,}well known actress moved here to provide a better environment for her young fammily to grow up in. Most people in our class live here because it is within easy reach of major towns nearby in which their family works.Those interviewed in the village gave many reasons for living here.They described it as being 'quiet' 'unspoiled' and a pleasant place to live. Some came to work here, some to live in retirement homes and
